snippet.title: ✅  Johnny Depp demanded Amber Heard 'stop nude scenes' over jealousy of co-stars
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   demanded that Amber Heard “stop doing nudity” and cut down on intimate scenes as he was jealous of her co-stars, a court heard.  Joshua Drew said his ex-wife had been friends with Ms Heard, who told her Depp had a “particular issue” with James Franco, who the actress had worked with in the 2015 film The Adder Diaries.  Drew was giving evidence in Depp’s libel action against The Sun newspaper over a 2018 article which labelled him a “wife beater”.   In a written witness statement, Drew said in 2015 he and his  then-fiancee Raquel “Rocky” Pennington moved into the Eastern Columbia Building in LA, where Depp, now 57, and Heard, 34, had a penthouse.     Drew said: “Johnny was jealous. Rocky told me, based on her conversations with Amber, that Johnny had a particular issue  with James Franco.   “He and Amber had some intimate scenes in a project they were filming, which Johnny did not want her doing.  "They were arguing about it very regularly.”   Drew added: “Johnny had demanded Amber st ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #AmberHeard, #JamesFranco, #Courtcase
